profile:
We have the professional experience, specialized equipment, and top-quality products you need to make permanent foundation repairs. We lead by example, and have been setting the standard for the rest of the foundation repair industry for decades.
***
Abalon Foundation Repairs – Calgary specializes in foundation crack repairs, basement waterproofing repairs and foundation settling and shifting repairs (underpinning) for residential commercial and industrial clients.
***
Our experienced staff includes a technical support team that works diligently to bring you the latest in technology and up-to-date engineered repairs, to get the job done right, on time, and on budget. Our team of registered Engineering Technologists are members of The Association of Science and Engineering Technology Professionals of Alberta (ASET) who ensure all projects are properly diagnosed, supervised and managed.
***
Following our philosophy, has made Abalon Foundation Repair – Calgary a reputable company that is committed to excellence. Our reputation provides confidence, as we have successfully repaired over 50,000 basements. Abalon Foundation Repair  – Calgary has maintained an A+ rating with the Better Business Bureau, thanks to our focus on quality, and honest hard work for each and every one of our customers. We work hard and it shows. Abalon Foundation Repair – Calgary is the company that property owners can trust. Before any work is performed, we provide a detailed estimate. We will educate, inform, and advise you on your next steps to getting your foundation repair issue resolved. No pressure or obligation, just honest, professional advice. Included in all our basement foundation repairs is a complete warranty on our work. We stand behind our workmanship and products.
services:

crack repairs,

profile:
We are a family business with over 40 years of experience.  When you need skilled waterproofers to protect your belongings stored in your basement, SealerMan Waterproofing is at your service. We waterproof and restore basements at prices you can afford. Whether you have leaky basements or concrete problems, make us your number one choice. Quality work at affordable pricing; better then the competition!

Main Services: Waterproofing, Leaky Basements, Foundation Repair, Concrete Restoration, Parging Repair, Parkades Repair.
